labels.value: src.test.resources.features.api.Feedbacks_feature.As a Customer I want to have an option to leave feedback so I could express my opinion on service and culinary experience.

name: Unsuccessful post of a feedback for a booking that is in future

steps.name: Given the user has logged in and made a reservation for table number "table-104" for "5" guest and from time "14:00" to "15:30" at "location-001" for a future reservation
When the user tries to give a cuisine rating "4" and service rating of "5"
Then the response status-code should be 400
And the response-body should have message "Can't provide feedback at this moment"
